title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository providing a lightweight, extensible framework for running large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, enabling programmatic interaction with local LLMs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, supporting Node.js and browser environments.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, allowing use of local LLMs within LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama, offering ChatGPT-like interface for local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting and conversation management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like plugin using Ollama models for local code completion in VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG pipeline combining Ollama with ChromaDB for document Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any Discord server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama, allowing teams to chat with local LLMs inside Slack.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm chart to deploy Ollama in-cluster with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images for Ollama with CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, supporting synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with support for streaming and cancellation tokens.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI for Ollama models with session memory and model switching.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that uses Ollama models for local note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting Ollama models act as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-nextjs
summary: Next.js starter template with serverless API routes proxying to Ollama.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex integration for Ollama, enabling local RAG and agent workflows.
